title: AFFCO USA Recalls Frozen Raw Lamb Products Imported Without Benefit of Import Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, Oct. 21, 2021, AFFCO USA, Importer of Record in Jacksonville, Fla., is recalling approximately 24,461 pounds of frozen raw lamb shoulder products that were not presented for import re-inspection into the United States, the U.S. Department of Agriculture’s Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS)...
impacted_products: 24,461 pounds of frozen raw lamb shoulder
